Uses of Class
com.method5.jot.signing.SigningProvider

Packages that use SigningProvider
Package
Description
com.method5.jot.extrinsic
Constructs and represents Substrate extrinsics including payloads, versions, signatures, and encoding logic.
com.method5.jot.extrinsic.call
Provides strongly typed helper methods for constructing known extrinsic calls, such as balances.transfer or multisig.asMulti.
com.method5.jot.signing
Handles transaction payload signing using sr25519 and ed25519, including payload encoding, signature appending, and signer abstraction.
com.method5.jot.wallet
High-level wallet abstraction supporting key management, persistent storage, and address generation for SS58 accounts.
